headline: Postal service plans to open last-mile delivery network to more shippers in money-raising move
summary: The U.S. Postal Service said Wednesday it intends to open its “last-mile” delivery network, the most expensive part of the shipping process, to large and small shippers, expanding beyond current arrangements with giants such as Amazon and UPS.  The postal service expects to accept bids in late January or early February from other shippers, which will propose their own mix of volume, price and delivery timing.  The agency will award contracts later in 2026, based on where it can provide same- and next-day delivery service at a profit.

content.title: Postal service plans to open last-mile delivery network to more shippers in money-raising move
content.summary: The U.S. Postal Service said Wednesday it intends to open its “last-mile” delivery network, the most expensive part of the shipping process, to large and small shippers, expanding beyond current arrangements with giants such as Amazon and UPS.  The postal service expects to accept bids in late January or early February from other shippers, which will propose their own mix of volume, price and delivery timing.  The agency will award contracts later in 2026, based on where it can provide same- and next-day delivery service at a profit.

thumbnail.caption: FILE - Postmaster General David Steiner speaks at an event marking the 250th anniversary of postal service's founding, July 23, 2025, in Washington. (AP Photo/Cliff Owen, File)

headline: Amazon Names New AI Chief Amid Battle to Take on Tech Rivals
summary: Peter DeSantis will lead the new group, Amazon Chief Executive Officer Andy Jassy said Wednesday in a message to employees, which was also posted on the company’s corporate blog.  The new organization will combine Amazon’s Artificial General Intelligence team — which oversees the company’s Nova-branded AI models and the digital brains of the Alexa voice assistant — with Amazon’s chipmaking unit and quantum computing research.

content.title: Amazon Names New AI Chief Amid Battle to Take on Tech Rivals
content.summary: Peter DeSantis will lead the new group, Amazon Chief Executive Officer Andy Jassy said Wednesday in a message to employees, which was also posted on the company’s corporate blog.  The new organization will combine Amazon’s Artificial General Intelligence team — which oversees the company’s Nova-branded AI models and the digital brains of the Alexa voice assistant — with Amazon’s chipmaking unit and quantum computing research.

headline: Amazon shakes up AI team as veteran Prasad leaves, DeSantis promoted
summary: Amazon is shaking up its artificial intelligence team with one long-time veteran heading for the exit and another ​taking over a more expansive group that includes AI models, custom silicon ‌and quantum computing.  The move comes just two weeks after the Amazon Web Services annual cloud computing conference ‌in Las Vegas, which the company has turned into a showcase for AI tools and services.  Amazon has been working to shake a reputation that it is trailing competitors like Google, Microsoft and OpenAI in developing AI models.

content.title: Amazon shakes up AI team as veteran Prasad leaves, DeSantis promoted
content.summary: Amazon is shaking up its artificial intelligence team with one long-time veteran heading for the exit and another ​taking over a more expansive group that includes AI models, custom silicon ‌and quantum computing.  The move comes just two weeks after the Amazon Web Services annual cloud computing conference ‌in Las Vegas, which the company has turned into a showcase for AI tools and services.  Amazon has been working to shake a reputation that it is trailing competitors like Google, Microsoft and OpenAI in developing AI models.

headline: What to know about bidding war between Netflix and Paramount for Warner Bros.
summary: Warner Bros. is telling shareholders of the company that it believes a $72 billion buyout offer from Netflix is superior, and to reject a hostile takeover bid from Paramount Skydance.  Paramount went hostile with its bid last week, asking shareholders to reject the deal with Netflix favored by the board of Warner Bros.  Paramount is offering $30 per Warner share, or $77.9 billion, to Netflix’s $27.75 per share.

content.title: What to know about bidding war between Netflix and Paramount for Warner Bros.
content.summary: Warner Bros. is telling shareholders of the company that it believes a $72 billion buyout offer from Netflix is superior, and to reject a hostile takeover bid from Paramount Skydance.  Paramount went hostile with its bid last week, asking shareholders to reject the deal with Netflix favored by the board of Warner Bros.  Paramount is offering $30 per Warner share, or $77.9 billion, to Netflix’s $27.75 per share.

headline: Oracle's data center funding, Amazon's OpenAI stake: Reports
summary: Oracle's (ORCL) primary funding partner, Blue Owl Capital (OWL), is reportedly not funding the company's latest artificial intelligence (AI) data center build-out. Meanwhile, other reports say that Amazon (AMZN) is in talks to invest $10B in OpenAI (OPAI.PVT). Bloomberg Intelligence analyst Mandeep Singh joins Morning Brief host Julie Hyman to discuss the reports. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: Oracle's data center funding, Amazon's OpenAI stake: Reports
content.description:
Oracle's (ORCL) primary funding partner, Blue Owl Capital (OWL), is reportedly not funding the company's latest artificial intelligence (AI) data center build-out.

Meanwhile, other reports say that Amazon (AMZN) is in talks to invest $10B in OpenAI (OPAI.PVT).

Bloomberg Intelligence analyst Mandeep Singh joins Morning Brief host Julie Hyman to discuss the reports.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: HT Materials Science-led Consortium Receives $2.6 Million Grant From Disruptive Technologies Innovation Fund to Develop Direct-Liquid Cooling Technology
summary: HT Materials Science (HTMS) announced today that DLCool, a consortium it leads in partnership with Dublin City University (DCU) and solid-state heat pump manufacturer Exergyn Ltd., has been awarded a €2.3 million ($USD2.6 million) grant from Disruptive Technologies Innovation Funding. The DLCool consortium, based at the DCU Innovation Hub, was established by HTMS to develop innovative technologies that increase energy and lower energy consumption in cooling systems.

content.title: HT Materials Science-led Consortium Receives $2.6 Million Grant From Disruptive Technologies Innovation Fund to Develop Direct-Liquid Cooling Technology
content.summary: HT Materials Science (HTMS) announced today that DLCool, a consortium it leads in partnership with Dublin City University (DCU) and solid-state heat pump manufacturer Exergyn Ltd., has been awarded a €2.3 million ($USD2.6 million) grant from Disruptive Technologies Innovation Funding. The DLCool consortium, based at the DCU Innovation Hub, was established by HTMS to develop innovative technologies that increase energy and lower energy consumption in cooling systems.

headline: Amerit Fleet Solutions Announces Ross Rachey’s Promotion to Chief Executive Officer; Welcomes Keith Weidman as Chief Financial Officer
summary: WALNUT CREEK, Calif. & CHARLOTTE, N.C., December 17, 2025--Amerit Fleet Solutions ("Amerit"), the industry’s leading provider of customized fleet maintenance and repair programs, today announced the promotion of Ross Rachey from President and Chief Operating Officer to Chief Executive Officer. Dan Williams, Co-founder and CEO, will remain a close advisor to the Company on the Board of Directors alongside Co-founder Amein Punjani. Additionally, Amerit announced the appointment of Keith Weidman as

content.title: Amerit Fleet Solutions Announces Ross Rachey’s Promotion to Chief Executive Officer; Welcomes Keith Weidman as Chief Financial Officer
content.summary: WALNUT CREEK, Calif. & CHARLOTTE, N.C., December 17, 2025--Amerit Fleet Solutions ("Amerit"), the industry’s leading provider of customized fleet maintenance and repair programs, today announced the promotion of Ross Rachey from President and Chief Operating Officer to Chief Executive Officer. Dan Williams, Co-founder and CEO, will remain a close advisor to the Company on the Board of Directors alongside Co-founder Amein Punjani. Additionally, Amerit announced the appointment of Keith Weidman as

headline: Warner Bros will urge shareholders to reject hostile bid as Trump attacks Paramount
summary: Warner Bros Discovery is expected to urge shareholders to vote against Paramount's hostile takeover bid. This comes after Jared Kushner, Trump's son-in-law, also withdrew his private equity firm from the financing of the offer.View on euronews

headline: OpenAI in Initial Talks to Raise $10 Billion From Amazon
summary: OpenAI is in initial talks to raise at least $10 billion from Amazon and use its chips, a potential win for the online retailer's effort to broaden its AI industry presence and compete with Nvidia. The deal under discussion could value OpenAI north of $500 billion and see it adopt Amazon's Trainium chip, a person with knowledge of the matter said. Bloomberg's Peter Elstrom reports.

content.title: OpenAI in Initial Talks to Raise $10 Billion From Amazon
content.description: OpenAI is in initial talks to raise at least $10 billion from Amazon and use its chips, a potential win for the online retailer's effort to broaden its AI industry presence and compete with Nvidia. The deal under discussion could value OpenAI north of $500 billion and see it adopt Amazon's Trainium chip, a person with knowledge of the matter said. Bloomberg's Peter Elstrom reports.

headline: China cements global lead in smart vacuums as Picea acquires Roomba maker iRobot
summary: Chinese robotics manufacturers are set to cement their dominance in the global smart vacuum market with Picea Robotics' acquisition of Roomba maker iRobot, after the US firm's proposed sale to Amazon.com last year fell through due to regulatory hurdles. China-based suppliers held the top five spots for worldwide smart robotic vacuum shipments in the first three quarters of 2025, led by Roborock with a 21.7 per cent market share, equal to 3.8 million units, according to data from research firm ID

headline: Amazon in talks to invest about $10 billion in OpenAI, source says
summary: Amazon.com Inc is in talks to invest in ChatGPT-maker OpenAI in a potential deal that could value the artificial intelligence firm at more ​than $500 billion, a source familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.  Amazon may invest about $10 ‌billion in OpenAI, but the talks between the two firms are "very fluid", the source said on condition of anonymity ‌because the matter is private.  The potential deal highlights the AI sector's relentless demand for computing power as companies race to build systems rivaling or surpassing human intelligence.

content.title: Amazon in talks to invest about $10 billion in OpenAI, source says

Amazon may invest about $10 ‌billion in OpenAI, but the talks between the two firms are "very fluid", the source said on condition of anonymity ‌because the matter is private.  The potential deal highlights the AI sector's relentless demand for computing power as companies race to build systems rivaling or surpassing human intelligence.

headline: Dave Ramsey Says He Made A Record $300M In 2025 – 'God's Been Good To Me'
summary: Dave Ramsey has become one of the wealthiest and most well-known personal finance figures in the U.S. By the age of 26, he was earning about $250,000 a year and had built a net worth of roughly $1 million, only to lose it all when his highly leveraged real estate investments ran into trouble. After declaring bankruptcy, he rebuilt his finances and became a leading financial educator. Ramsey saw the highest annual income of his career this year, with his company Ramsey Solutions generating about
